data.eml:eml: Preliminary report on the living non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea) from Tunisia with the description of a new Psychrodromus species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zaibi, Chahira, Scharf, Burkhard, Viehberg, Finn Andreas, Keyser, Dietmar, Kamoun, Fekri (2013): Preliminary report on the living non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea) from Tunisia with the description of a new Psychrodromus species. Zootaxa 3626 (4): 499-516, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3626.4.5
